## Player.onRequestDetailStream() method

Callback method to retrieve the Stream to send detailed information. This stream is used to send hand and head movements, facial expressions, etc.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onRequestDetailStream(factory:DetailInputStreamFactory): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  factory | [DetailInputStreamFactory](./verse-core.detailinputstreamfactory.md) |  |

**Returns:**

void
